channel.title: Sheikh Azizul Hakim
channel.description: Recent content on Sheikh Azizul Hakim

item.title: On Reinventing the Wheels on Shoulder of Giants
item.description: Hence, I am making my personal portfolio, with almost nothing to showcase. Years ago, in high school, I thought myself a great deal of a writer. Actually, the things I wrote then still scares me. Form is temporary, class is permanent, they say. I am getting narcissistic, but that’s how I view my impressive past. I’d been an attentive science student in my secondary and higher secondary levels. We always do science on “shoulder of giants”.

item.title: About me
item.description: Peace be upon you. All praises belong to God, the Majestic, the Sublime. I am Sheikh Azizul Hakim, currently persuing a CS undergrad degree in BUET. I am passionate about a research oriented career in theoretical computer science, with a focus in bioinformatics. What I know about them is a droplet, what people know is a gallon perhaps, and what we do not know is greater than the Pacific. Apart from my CS academics, I love to read about philosophy, jurisprudence, theology, mystics.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Email me at skazizul55@gmail.com. You may follow me at Twitter or Facebook. My Github account may be accessed here. I promise, none of the social media links would be impressive.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Academic Projects: Game of Pawns A chess game, implemented in structured programming paradigm using C. A graphics library iGraphics was used to facilitate the display. Repository Durbeen A visual programming platform in বাংলা for kids implemented with Java and JavaFX. Highly inspired by MIT’s Scratch. Repository
